game.name: Cookie Flipper
game.shortDescription: A casual, nostalgic puzzle game with a delicious twist! Has 72 preset levels, and near infinite custom levels. Tired of Match 3, and want a change? Try Cookie Flipper, wish list it today!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A casual, nostalgic puzzle game with a delicious twist! Has 72 preset levels, and near infinite custom levels. Tired of Match 3, and want a change? Try Cookie Flipper, wish list it today!
